medical_history.chief_complaint: Midepigastric pain radiating to the back
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presents with midepigastric pain that radiates to the back. This pain is reported to be similar to a previous episode about ___ years ago, which improved with PPI treatment. She also experiences intermittent nausea but denies emesis, fevers, chills, and jaundice.
